results.title: Is the Co-administration of Metformin and Clomiphene Superior to Induce Ovulation in Infertile Patients With Poly Cystic Ovary Syndrome and Confirmed Insulin-Resistance: A Double Blind Randomized Clinical Trial
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@ can be reduced by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Nevertheless, no single randomized clinical trial (RCT) has studied @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Primary_Ovarian_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016649 @@@PCOS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Obesity as a Part of Polycysric Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)-A Review of Pathophysiology and Comprehensive Therapeutic Strategies.
results.text_hl: Combination therapies, such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @GENE_GLP1R @GENE_2740 @@@GLP-1 receptor@@@ agonists, provide comprehensive treatment for both reproductive and metabolic aspects of @<m>DISEASE_Primary_Ovarian_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016649 @@@PCOS@@@.

results.title: Metformin and health outcomes: An umbrella review of systematic reviews with meta-analyses.
results.text_hl: In meta-analyses of RCTs, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was associated with a lower incidence of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ in people with @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@ or no @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ at baseline; lower @DISEASE_Ovarian_Hyperstimulation_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D016471 @@@ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome@@@ incidence (in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ in controlled ovarian stimulation); higher success for clinical pregnancy rate in @<m>DISEASE_Primary_Ovarian_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016649 @@@poly-cystic ovary syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Primary_Ovarian_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016649 @@@PCOS@@@); and significant reduction in body mass index in people with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1 @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@type 1 diabetes mellitus@@@, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ who have @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@/@DISEASE_Overweight @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Primary_Ovarian_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016649 @@@PCOS@@@ and in @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@/@DISEASE_Overweight @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@.

results.title: Metformin improves d-galactose induced premature ovarian insufficiency through PI3K-Akt-FOXO3a pathway.
results.text_hl: Our finding proposed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ may be a promising alternative treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Primary_Ovarian_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016649 @@@POI@@@.

results.title: Metformin Promotes Proliferation of Mouse Female Germline Stem Cells by Histone Acetylation Modification of Traf2.
results.text_hl: To elucidate the mechanism by which @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ promoted FGSCs proliferation, Chromatin Immunoprecipitation Sequencing of histone 3 lysine 27 acetylation (H3K27ac) in FGSCs was performed with or without @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treatment.

results.title: The effect of calcium and vitamin D supplementation on menstrual cycle, body mass index and hyperandrogenism state of women with poly cystic ovarian syndrome
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_D @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014807 @@@Vitamin D@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ supplementation in addition to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Primary_Ovarian_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016649 @@@PCOS@@@ could result in a better outcome in a variety of @<m>DISEASE_Primary_Ovarian_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016649 @@@PCOS@@@ symptoms including menstrual regularity, and ovulation.
